name: Neon Runner (Zachary)
description:
A/D or LEFT/RIGHT - Move

MOUSE - Select Menu Options

ESCAPE - Pause

    Neon Rider is a speed game in which you are running endlessly.  You must avoid the red blocks, and not fall off.  If you hit a red block twice, you will die.  If you fall off the edge, you will die.  Your speed increases as you go on.
